text: Forget pricey high - fashion pieces - actress and singer Zendaya proved that you don't need to spend a fortune in order to look stylist when she turned her grandfather's old button - down shirt into a chic dress. The 21 - year - old posted two different photos of herself posing in the oversized white Oxford, which she styled with a leather belt, and fans were quick to applaud her ability to transform anything into a gorgeous outfit.'So I went through my storage and found a bunch of my grandfather's old shirts,'she wrote in the caption.
